title: BADT26
text:
First meeting 2-3 Feb
Day 1 Monday, 2 Feb 2026 (12-16)
Lundmarkssalen Astronomihuset
12.15 Course introduction
12.25 Lecture with non-computer exercises: Bayesian inference and subjective probability
Reading: BR* (Chapters 1 and 2) and DBDA* (Chapter 2, 4 and 5)
Exercise 1: Probability
13.00 Break
13.15 Lecture about conjugate models
Readings: BR* (Chapters 3 and 5) and DBDA* (Chapters 6)
14.00 Break
14.15 Exercise 2: Conjugate models
15.00 Break
15.15 Lecture on Bayesian analysis using MCMC
Exercise 3. Write your own MCMC sampler
Day 2 Tuesday, 3 Feb 09.00 - 14.00
Pufendorf Institute for Advanced Studies
09.15 Bayesian analysis using MCMC
Reading: BR* (Chapters 6, 7, 8) and DBDA* (Chapter 7)
Exercise 3. Write your own MCMC sampler
10.00 Short lecture Introduction to software for MCMC sampling (Zheng)
Exercise 4. Get started with a software for MCMC sampling
10.30 Lecture Predictive performance in Bayesian inference
11.00 Break
11.15 Lecture Generalised Linear Regression models with exercises
Reading: BR* (Chapters 9, 10, 11) and DBDA* (Chapter 15)
Exercise 5. Specifying models through graphs
12-13 Lunch
13.15 Exercise 6. Specify and run GLMs in MCMC samplers.
14.15 Lecture on Decision theory Reading: 1* and 2*


Second meeting 24-25 Feb
Material for second meeting to come
